H0.text: The fuel tank is a part of a car's control system.

H1.text: Hydraulic jack is a part of a car that belongs to its control system.

H2.text: Steering wheel is the part of a car that belongs to its control system.

H3.text: Windshield wipers belong to the control system of a car.

A4.text: The steering wheel is the part of the steering system that the driver manipulates; the rest of the steering system responds to such driver inputs.

A5.text: A steering wheel (also called a driving wheel, a hand wheel, or simply wheel) is a type of steering control in vehicles.
